name: Elements of Analysis
description: This course provides the foundations of analysis and rigorous calculus for students who will take subsequent courses where these mathematical concepts are central of applications, but who have only taken courses with limited proofs. Topics include topology of Rn, implicit and inverse function theorems and rigorous integration theory.
prerequisites: MAT223H1/MATA23H3/MAT223H5/MAT240H1/MAT240H5, MAT235Y1/MAT235Y5/(MATB41H3, MATB42H3)/MAT237Y1/(MATB41H3, MATB42H3, MATB43H3)/MAT237Y5; (for FASE students, MAT185H, MAT195H/ESC195H)
